topics.body:
"@igotnopicks":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557b722d6368727c0b000c4e#post_557b722d6368727c0b000c4e
[bq="igotnopicks"]And last Castlevania.

God Konami had an awful press conference.[/bq]
Speaking of Castlevania the original producer's "Bloodstained: Ritual of the night" kickstarter smashed kickstarter records.


You know how Castlevania used to be good?  Well short explanation: the original creators have left konami and created Bloodstained.  Call me crazy, but I think the new Castlevania is going to suck already, cause all the original people left to create Bloodstained and the people Konami replaced them with have never touched Castlevania.

The new Castlevania will probably be the equivalent of DmC: Devil May Cry in that it probably not going to be that bad but it won't be a Castlevania game and probably just be a bastardization of the characters and the story; or it could be what Other M was.


Tl:dr; the new Castlevania is probably going to suck cause all the people previously working on Castlevania left to make Bloodstained; the people they now have in charge have no idea what they're doing and it's probably going to be what DmC: Devil May Cry is to the Devil May Cry series.
